PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15542018-12-12,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActParks Canada Agency Act
PrecisAppointment of MICHAEL NADLER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be interim Chief Executive Officer of the Parks Canada Agency, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 7, 2019, until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of MICHAEL NADLER of Ottawa, Ontario, to be interim Chief Executive Officer of the Parks Canada Agency, to hold office during pleasure, effective January 7, 2019, until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed.
